name: Buried in Time (itch)
description:
The secrets of the crypt lost in time --------------------------- Description

The great historian Solomam was called to a small museum in Lisbon because of the discovery of a crypt. Complete the puzzles and explore the crypt to discover all its secrets and reach the final room.

--------------------------- About the game
  • A  single-player puzzle game with a fascinating history.
  • Easy and simple Inputs.
  • History related facts.
  • Two possible endings.
  • Interactions with multiple npcs.
--------------------------- Controls
  • Arrow Keys and W, A, S, D - Move Around.
  • Z - Interact / Push Objects.
--------------------------- Team
